00027 /*
00028  * Handler para o sinal de TSTP (Ctrl+Z)
00029  */
00030 void hantstp (int signum, siginfo_t *siginfo, void* context) {
00031 
00032         std::list <Job*>::iterator curr, end;
00033 
00034         for (curr = jobList.begin(), end = jobList.end(); curr != end && (*curr)->inBG(); curr++);
00035         
00036         if (curr != end) {
00037                 kill (-(*curr)->getPGID(), SIGTSTP);
00038                 fprintf(stderr, "hantstp - TSTP no filho %d - %s\n", (*curr)->getProcess(0)->getPID(), (*curr)->getCommand().c_str());
00039         }
00040 }
00041

00043  * Retomada do processo parado
00044  */
00045 void hancont (int signum) {
00046 
00047         fprintf (stderr, "hancont - Filho voltando a ativa\n");
00048 }

00050 /*
00051  *      Mostra todos os jobs da lista
00052  */
00053 void jobs (void) {
00054 
00055         std::list<Job*>::iterator curr,end;
00056         for (curr = jobList.begin(), end = jobList.end(); curr != end; curr++) {
00057                 (*curr)->print();
00058         }
00059 }

00061 /*
00062  * Handler para sinais de processos filhos
00063  */
00064 void hanchld (int signum, siginfo_t *siginfo, void* useless) {
00065 
00066         std::list<Job*>::iterator curr, end;
00067         int status;
00068         int err;
00069         fprintf (stderr, "hanchld - Filho %d ", siginfo->si_pid);
00070         fprintf (stderr, "com code %d com status %d\n",
00071                                                 siginfo->si_code, siginfo->si_status);
00072         //TODO mudar esse comentario e lembrar o que isso faz
00073         // encontra o job se for o primeiro processo
00074         for (curr = jobList.begin(), end = jobList.end(); curr != end && (*curr)->getPGID() != siginfo->si_pid; curr++);
00075 
00076         if (siginfo->si_code == CLD_KILLED || siginfo->si_code == CLD_EXITED) {
00077                 fprintf (stderr, "filho morreu\n");
00078                 if (curr != end) {
00079                         fprintf (stderr, "Done\n");
00080                         (*curr)->print();
00081                         (*curr)->destroy();
00082                         jobList.erase (curr);
00083                 }
00084                 // tratar processos defuntos
00085 
00086 //              if (waitpid (siginfo->si_pid, &status, 0) == -1) {
00087 //                      err = errno;
00088 //                      fprintf (stderr, "error: ");
00089 //                      if (err == ECHILD)      fprintf (stderr, "process does not exist or is not my child\n");
00090 //                      else if (err == EINTR)  fprintf (stderr, "SIGCHLD was caught\n");
00091 //                      else    fprintf (stderr, "EINVAL\n");
00092 //              } else {
00093 //                      tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSADRAIN, initializer.getTermios());
00094 //                      tcsetpgrp (STDIN_FILENO, initializer.getPGID());
00095 //              }
00096         } else if (siginfo->si_code == CLD_STOPPED) {
00097                 fprintf (stderr, "filho parou\n");
00098         //      if (curr != end)
00099         //              tcgetattr (STDIN_FILENO, (*curr)->getTermios())
00100                 /*if (waitpid (siginfo->si_pid, &status, WNOHANG) == -1) {
00101                         err = errno;
00102                         fprintf (stderr, stderr, "Erro: ");
00103                         if (err == ECHILD)      fprintf (stderr, "processo nao existe ou nao e meu\n");
00104                         else if (err == EINTR)  fprintf (stderr, "SIGCHLD possivelmente ferrou isso\n");
00105                         else    fprintf (stderr, "EINVAL\n");
00106                 } else {
00107                         fprintf (stderr, "hanchld - nao foi morte nem parada\n");
00108                 }*/
00109         }
00110 }

00140 /*
00141  *      Mostra o diretorio atual
00142  *      
00143  *      @Exception
00144  *              -1      Diretorio maior que 256 caracteres
00145  */
00146 void showDirectoryName (void) {
00147 
00148         char buf[256];
00149         if (buf != getcwd(buf, 256))    throw -1; //buffer overflow
00150         printf ("%s\n", buf);
00151 }
00152 
00153 /*
00154  *      Coloca o job em execucao
00155  *
00156  *      @Param
00157  *              ID do job
00158  *      @Exception
00159  *              -ID     Job nao encontrado
00160  */
00161 void foreground (int id) {
00162         std::list<Job*>::iterator curr, end;
00163         int status;
00164         int err;
00165 
00166         // procura o job
00167         for (curr = jobList.begin(), end = jobList.end(); curr != end && (*curr)->getID() != id; curr++);
00168 
00169         if (curr == end) {
00170                 throw -id;
00171         } else {
00172                 (*curr)->setBG(false);
00173                 
00174 //              tcsetattr(STDIN_FILENO, TCSADRAIN, (*curr)->getTermios());
00175 //              tcsetpgrp (STDIN_FILENO, (*curr)->getPGID());
00176                 
00177                 kill (-(*curr)->getPGID(), SIGCONT); /*TODO descobrir como se volta o processo para fg*/
00178                 if (waitpid ((*curr)->getPGID(), &status, WUNTRACED) == -1) {
00179                         err = errno;
00180                         fprintf (stderr, "Erro: ");
00181                         if (err == ECHILD)      fprintf (stderr, "processo nao existe ou nao eh meu filho\n");
00182                         else if (err == EINTR)  fprintf (stderr, "SIGCHLD provavelmente ferrou tudo\n");
00183                         else    fprintf (stderr, "EINVAL\n");
00184                 } else {
00185                         if (WIFEXITED(status)) {
00186                                 fprintf (stderr, "Filho %d saiu com %d\n", (*curr)->getPGID(), WEXITSTATUS(status));
00187                         } else if (WIFSIGNALED(status)) {
00188                                 fprintf (stderr, "Filho %d foi terminado por um sinal %d\n", (*curr)->getPGID(),  WTERMSIG(status)==SIGTSTP);
00189                         } else if (WIFSTOPPED(status)) {
00190                                 fprintf (stderr, "Filho %d estava stopped ainda %d\n", (*curr)->getPGID(), WSTOPSIG(status));
00191                         } else if (WIFCONTINUED(status)) {
00192                                 fprintf (stderr, "Filho %d continuou\n", (*curr)->getPGID());
00193                         }
00194                 }
00195         }
00196 }
00197 
00198 void background (int id) {
00199         std::list<Job*>::iterator curr, end;
00200         for (curr = jobList.begin(), end = jobList.end(); curr != end && (*curr)->getID() != id; curr++);
00201         if (curr == end) {
00202                 throw -id;
00203         } else {
00204                 (*curr)->setBG(true);
00205                 // shooSH volta ao terminal
00206                 tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSADRAIN, initializer.getTermios());
00207                 tcsetpgrp (STDIN_FILENO, initializer.getPGID());
00208                 
00209                 kill (-(*curr)->getPGID(), SIGCONT);
00210         }
00211 }

00213                 
00214 void shooSH_init() { 
00215 
00216         initializer.init();     
00217         
00218         sa_chld.sa_sigaction = &hanchld;
00219         sa_chld.sa_flags = SA_SIGINFO;
00220         
00221         sa_tstp.sa_sigaction = &hantstp;
00222         sa_tstp.sa_flags = SA_SIGINFO;
00223 
00224         sa_cont.sa_handler = &hancont;
00225         sa_cont.sa_flags = 0;
00226 
00227         sa_ttin.sa_sigaction = &hanttin;
00228         sa_ttin.sa_flags = SA_SIGINFO;
00229 
00230         sa_ttou.sa_handler = &hanttou;
00231         sa_ttou.sa_flags = 0;
00232 
00233         /*Tratamento decente de sinais*/
00234         sigaction (SIGCHLD, &sa_chld, NULL);
00235         sigaction (SIGTSTP, &sa_tstp, NULL);
00236         sigaction (SIGCONT, &sa_cont, NULL);
00237         sigaction (SIGTTIN, &sa_ttin, NULL);
00238         sigaction (SIGTTOU, &sa_ttou, NULL);
00239 
00240         currID = 0;
00241 }

00243 
00247 void shooSH_run (void) {
00248         Job* job;
00249         Parser p;
00250         Executor executor;
00251         bool exited = false;
00252         
00253         while (!exited) {
00254                 std::cout << "shooSH> ";
00255                 job = p.parseLine ();
00256                 history.push_back (job->getCommand());
00257 
00258                 if (!(job->isNop()||job->hasExited())) {
00259                         job->setID (++currID);
00260                         jobList.push_back (job);
00261 
00262                         if (job->getCommand()[0] == 'f') {
00263                                 foreground (currID-1);
00264                         } else {
00265                                 executor.execute (jobList.back());
00266                                 jobs();
00267                         }
00268                 } else {
00269                         exited = job->hasExited();
00270                 }
00271                 job = NULL;
00272                 // retorna o controle para a shell
00273                 tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSADRAIN, initializer.getTermios());
00274                 tcsetpgrp (STDIN_FILENO, initializer.getPGID());
00275         }
00276 }
